item.title: 日本大洋石油公司用受美国制裁的油轮进口俄罗斯原油
item.description: 日本炼油企业大洋石油公司正在一艘被美国财政部和欧盟列入黑名单的油轮上接收一批俄罗斯原油。【原文：The Japanese oil refiner Taiyo Oil Co. is taking delivery of a cargo of Russian crude on a tanker that’s blacklisted by both the US Treasury and the European Union.】

item.title: 关键的 30 年期国债拍卖在即，美国国债赢得一些喘息机会
item.description: 美国国债缩减了上周的跌幅，在周四的 30 年期国债拍卖前赢得了一些喘息的机会，这次拍卖将对陷入困境的国债需求进行新的考验。【原文：US Treasuries trimmed last week’s losses, winning some respite ahead of Thursday’s auction of 30-year debt that will offer a fresh test of demand for the beleaguered securities.】

item.title: 建立在纸面上的帝国有望从特朗普的贸易战中获益
item.description:
苏扎诺的收购狂潮，包括与金佰利的交易，显示了拉美最大经济体的高管们如何通过充满争议的地缘政治开展工作。【原文：

Suzano’s buying spree, including a Kimberly-Clark deal, shows how executives in Latin America’s largest economy can work through fraught geopolitics.

】

item.title: HarbourView 与 KKR 签订 5 亿美元融资协议，由音乐提供支持
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一份声明，为弗利特伍德-麦克（Fleetwood Mac）和维兹-卡利法（Wiz Khalifa）等艺人拥有音乐版税的投资公司 HarbourView Equity Partners 已从 KKR & Co.管理的工具中筹集了 5 亿美元的债务融资。【原文：HarbourView Equity Partners, the investment firm that owns music royalties for artists including Fleetwood Mac and Wiz Khalifa, has raised $500 million in debt financing from vehicles managed by KKR & Co., according to a statement reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税混乱威胁到他推动 "铁锈地带 "复兴的努力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的标志性贸易政策有可能会适得其反，因为它可能会破坏其他首要任务：美国制造业和美国铁锈地带的复兴。【原文：President Donald Trump’s signature trade policy is threatening to backfire by upending other top priorities: the revival of US manufacturing and the American Rust Belt.】

item.title: 资深科塔克基金经理拉克希米-艾耶将加入巴贾吉集团
item.description: 印度科塔克-马恒达集团（Kotak Mahindra Group）的资深基金经理拉克希米-艾耶尔（Lakshmi Iyer）在该公司工作了二十多年后辞职了。【原文：Lakshmi Iyer, a veteran fund manager at India’s Kotak Mahindra Group, has quit after over twenty years at the firm, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 南非服装零售商无视经济增长前景，计划开设更多店铺
item.description: 尽管这个非洲大陆工业化程度最高的经济体下调了经济增长预期，但南非服装零售商仍将在明年增加数百家新店。【原文：South African clothing retailers are adding hundreds of new stores in the next year, even as the continent’s most-industrialized economy downgrades its economic growth forecast.】

item.title: 量子计算公司 IonQ 以 10 亿美元收购英国初创公司
item.description: 美国量子计算公司 IonQ 同意以 10.8 亿美元的价格收购英国初创公司 Oxford Ionics。【原文：US quantum computing company IonQ has agreed to buy UK startup Oxford Ionics in a $1.08 billion deal that highlights increasing commercial confidence in what has largely been an experimental field of computing.】

item.title: 建造商 Seazen 酝酿发行高达 3 亿美元的离岸债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，海珍集团有限公司正在考虑通过发行 2.5 年期美元债券筹集 2 亿至 3 亿美元资金。【原文：Seazen Group Ltd. is considering raising $200 million to $300 million through a 2.5-year dollar bond offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚将从 7 月 1 日起扩大服务税以削减赤字
item.description: 马来西亚财政部表示，从 7 月 1 日起，马来西亚将扩大销售和服务税的征收范围，将建筑业和金融服务业纳入其中。【原文：Malaysia is expanding its sales and service tax to include the construction and financial services sectors effective July 1, according to the Finance Ministry.】

item.title: 英国石油公司将人工智能置于提升业绩的核心位置
item.description: 当工程师准备钻探石油时，他们知道地下深处油井的终点，也可以选择起点，但在这两者之间有许多可能的路线。【原文：When engineers prepare to drill for oil, they know the spot deep underground where the well must end and can choose their starting point, but there are many possible routes in between.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "金顶计划 "为太空部队赢得现实意义创造了机会
item.description: 美国太空部队在唐纳德-特朗普总统首次执政期间成立，其 "星际迷航"（Star Trek）风格的标志引起了人们的笑话，并激发了 Netflix 公司与史蒂夫-卡瑞尔（Steve Carell）合作拍摄情景喜剧的灵感，五年后的今天，美国太空部队仍在寻求尊重。【原文：Five years after its formation during President Donald Trump’s first administration prompted jokes about the Star Trek-style logo and inspired a Netflix Inc. sitcom with Steve Carell, the US Space Force is still looking for respect.】

item.title: 科技巨头加大投入，人工智能基础设施贸易回暖
item.description: 为人工智能开发提供基础设施的公司股价在今年早些时候暴跌后一路飙升，因为大科技公司的支出恢复了投资者对这一动荡行业的信心。【原文：Shares of companies that provide infrastructure for artificial-intelligence development are soaring after a tumble earlier this year, as spending from Big Tech restores investor confidence in the volatile sector.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称英国的人工智能人才令世界羡慕并需要支持
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋将英国的人工智能人才形容为 "全世界羡慕的人才"，并特别提到了英国的研究人员、大学和初创企业。但他表示，英国需要更多的基础设施来释放他们的潜力。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang described the UK’s artificial intelligence talent as the “envy of the world,” specifically calling out its researchers, universities and startups. But he said the country needs to more infrastructure to unlock their potential.】

item.title: 双方商谈贸易，台湾对美出口创纪录
item.description: 台湾对美国的出口跃升至创纪录水平，这是因为在美国对台湾征收任何关税之前，台湾企业就已经开始发货。【原文：Taiwan’s exports to the US jumped to a record, surging as companies fired off shipments before any tariffs hit — gains that come as the two sides try to hammer out a trade deal.】

item.title: 赞比亚寻求汽车制造商在铜矿附近生产电动汽车零部件
item.description: 赞比亚已与汽车制造商举行会谈，以吸引供应商在其铜矿附近建设电动汽车零部件工厂。【原文：Zambia has held talks with carmakers to entice suppliers to build electric-vehicle components plants near its copper mines.】

item.title: 欧洲央行埃尔德森称欧洲必须捍卫法治标准
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森（Frank Elderson）表示，欧洲可以通过遵守甚至加强法治标准来促进经济福祉，并帮助提高欧元的全球作用。【原文：Europe can foster economic well-being and help increase the euro’s global role by adhering to and even strengthening rule of law standards, European Central Bank Executive Board member Frank Elderson said.】

item.title: 石油和天然气交易陷入困境。全球顶尖的并购律师事务所曾在这里工作过
item.description: Kirkland & Ellis 用十年时间建立了价值十多亿美元的能源和基础设施业务，并成为美国石油和天然气交易的顶级法律顾问。它完全可以从唐纳德-特朗普的 "钻井，宝贝，钻井 "议程中获益。【原文：Kirkland & Ellis spent a decade building a billion dollar-plus energy and infrastructure business and becoming the top legal adviser for US oil and gas deals. It was perfectly placed to benefit from Donald Trump’s “drill, baby, drill” agenda.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔称欧洲央行即将或已经结束宽松周期
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔表示，欧洲中央银行的降息周期即使还没有结束，也已接近尾声。【原文：The European Central Bank is nearly, if not already, at the end of its cycle of interest-rate cuts, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利、高盛认为经济复苏支撑股市
item.description: 华尔街的策略师们对美股越来越乐观，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Wall Street strategists are growing optimistic about US stocks, with forecasters at Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. the latest to suggest resilient economic growth would limit any pullback over the summer.】

item.title: B.Grimm 和 Digital Edge 将投资 10 亿美元建设泰国数据中心
item.description: 随着东南亚地区对人工智能、云计算和其他数字服务的需求不断增长，泰国电力生产商 B.Grimm Power Pcl 和 Digital Edge DC 将共同投资约 10 亿美元在泰国建设一个数据中心。【原文：Thai power producer B.Grimm Power Pcl and Digital Edge DC will jointly invest about $1 billion in a Thailand data center as demand rises for artificial intelligence, cloud computing and other digital services across Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 弗拉迪斯拉夫-祖博克谈冷战究竟是什么
item.description:
那我们是在一个新的地方吗？【原文：

And are we in a new one?

】

item.title: 苹果公司活动将聚焦人工智能斗争的 "生存风险
item.description: 今年以来，苹果公司的股价一直深受美国贸易政策的影响，但其年度开发者大会可能会让华尔街重新关注一个潜在的更大问题：苹果公司在人工智能方面的挣扎。【原文：Apple Inc. shares have been heavily tethered to US trade policies this year, but its annual developer’s conference could refocus Wall Street’s attention on a potentially bigger problem: its struggles with artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 党首称日本应在美国谈判中利用亚洲贸易集团
item.description: 日本最大的反对党领导人周一表示，日本应在地区自由贸易协定中发挥更大的作用，并在与美国的关税谈判中利用其扩张作为讨价还价的工具。【原文：Japan should take a bigger role in a regional free trade agreement and use its expansion as a bargaining tool in tariff negotiations with the US, the leader of the country’s largest opposition party said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国短端债券在有关中国人民银行可能进行交易的讨论中反弹
item.description: 中国短端主权债券反弹，原因是国有银行的大量购买引发了交易员关于央行是否是幕后黑手的争论。【原文：China’s short-end sovereign bonds rallied as heavy purchases by state banks spurred a debate among traders on whether the central bank was behind the move.】

item.title: 中国国防企业业绩飙升，巴基斯坦大肆采购武器
item.description: 周一，在巴基斯坦表示有意购买中国最先进的战斗机之一作为重大武器采购的一部分后，中国国防公司的股票大涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese defense companies rallied Monday, after Pakistan said it intends to buy one of the Asian power’s most-advanced fighter jets as a part of major arms purchase.】

item.title: 高通公司同意以 24 亿美元收购英国上市公司 Alphawave
item.description: 高通公司已同意以约 24 亿美元现金收购在伦敦上市的半导体公司 Alphawave IP Group Plc，以扩展其人工智能技术。【原文：Qualcomm Inc. has agreed to buy London-listed semiconductor company Alphawave IP Group Plc for about $2.4 billion in cash to expand its technology for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: WPP 首席执行官马克-雷德（Mark Read）即将退休，开始寻找继任者
item.description: WPP Plc.首席执行官马克-雷德（Mark Read）即将退休，全球最大的广告代理集团之一开始寻找继任者。【原文：WPP Plc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Read is to retire, kicking off a search for a successor at one of the world’s largest advertising agency groups.】

item.title: 中国大豆进口创纪录，美国争端引发更多巴西大豆流入中国
item.description: 上个月，中国的大豆进口量攀升至历史新高，原因是人们担心中国与美国的贸易战可能会提振全球大豆价格，而中国作为全球最大的买家，主要从巴西大量采购大豆。【原文：China’s soybean imports climbed to an all-time high last month as the world’s biggest buyer scooped up large volumes mainly from Brazil amid concerns that its trade war with the US could boost global prices.】

item.title: Sunnova 在屋顶太阳能的困境中申请破产
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc. 是美国最大的屋顶太阳能公司之一，由于债务增加和销售前景暗淡，该公司在得克萨斯州申请破产。【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc., one of the largest US rooftop solar companies, filed for bankruptcy in Texas following struggles with mounting debt and diminishing sales prospects.】
